function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Global epicentre of the pandemic shifting to europe","category":"Person","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Slow and haphazard initial reaction by the eu","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited mandate on public health for the eu","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Political and economic debates about financial recovery instruments","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Member states’ political opportunism complicating response to covid-19","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hesitation that the execution of the european green deal egd may fail or not meet the scale of the climate challenge","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Political challenges to the implementation of the egd, including opt-outs by member states and tight timelines for introducing the climate law","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Polarized opinion on the egd even before the onset of the coronavirus pandemic","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Public funding for egd initiatives may not prioritize health and safety measures to prevent disease transmission","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic transcends borders","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Stalled progress on major measures announced in the european green deal egd","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Need for greater integration and stronger eu-level institutions for covid-19 response","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disruption in the supply chain due to movement control and lockdown","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Loss of finance due to running cost and wages while project jobs are halted","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Restriction on labor affecting productivity and work progress","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contractors suffering a loss of income due to payment suspension during mco","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decline in national economy leads to reduced job opportunities for contractors","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Labor shortage and delay in materials supply due to covid-19 impact","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 impacting the construction industry globally","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Suspension and reduction of construction projects leading to loss of income for contractors","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruptions in the supply chain and labor shortage affecting contractor productivity","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High and frequent fluctuations in the overall economy","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Economic decline due to pandemic impact","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear sop for workforce management","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Seriousness of the covid-19 outbreak","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Slowdown or stoppage of developments due to financial constraints","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High level of debt and low cash reserves for construction companies","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Labor shortage and material supply chain disruptions","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contractual ambiguity regarding contractors’ entitlements during a virus outbreak","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Financial impact on contractors due to delay in projects and economic instability","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear sop guidelines from the authority","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty due to government instruction changes","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Legal costs and unexpected additional costs due to sop compliance","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relying solely on physical connections for spatial analysis may overlook other modes of disease transmission, such as airborne or surface-based transmission.","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases through the built environment microbiome","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of prior research on tendency and awareness towards fake news.","category":"Participation","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Unexplored social media use of recovered covid-19 cases.","category":"Participation","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Difference in social media use during covid-19 compared to normal times.","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of fake news and misinformation on social media during the pandemic leading to increased anxiety and panic.","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased impact of decision-making based on social media discussions, leading to potential resistance to official decisions.","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Motivated by collectivist interests, social media use during the pandemic differs from normal times, focusing on survival and shared concerns.","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exaggerated panic related to covid-19 due to social media posts","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of fake news related to covid-19 on social media","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of social media on decision-makers leading to frequent changes in proposed legislation","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High social media use during the pandemic","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of information sharing about recoveries from covid-19","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased isolation leading to permanent psychological disorders","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low environmental and personal hygiene awareness due to social media","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exaggeration and panic related to covid-19 due to social media","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited use of social media for support during covid-19","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium"}]}
